authors.bio: Full stack developer from Croatia, specialized in building web & mobile applications. Author of the book: “A Collection of Laravel Tutorials”, creator of open-source projects, and a father.

group.title: Working on a new SaaS product

group.excerpt: Refactoring current code base to make a SaaS application. Let me tell you what it is...

group.title: GitHub Archive Program 02/02/2020
group.author: Mario Bašić
group.excerpt: This was unexpected, but my open-source software, including this blog, will live for at least 100 generation in the GitHub Arctic Code Vault.

group.title: Steelseries Apex Raw Resurrection
group.author: Mario Bašić
group.excerpt: Using the lofree Dot wireless mechanical keyboard for 3 days has been painful at best. And because of that I've decided to resurrect my old keyboard which has served me well in the past.

group.title: Https domain redirect with Nginx
group.author: Mario Bašić
group.excerpt: After struggling for a day to figure out what needs to be done for this to work, I decided to write it all down in case that I need it again in the future.

group.title: Adding comments to your laravel application
group.author: Mario Bašić
group.excerpt: I've received an email yesterday letting me know that someone has created a YouTube video about my package laravelista/comments.

group.title: vendor:publish for the Lumen framework
group.author: Mario Bašić
group.excerpt: After receiving multiple requests to add Lumen 6 support, I realized that people are still using this package.
